titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, Maṅkai Pākar, time of Kōṉēriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ, year 6

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
tiru-puvaṉa-c-cakkiṟavartti kōṉ-ērimṉ
mai-koṇṭāṉ Uṭaiyār tiru-k-koṭuṅ-kuṉṟam-u⌈
ṭaiya nāyiṉār-kōyil tāṉattāṟku-c cōḻa-pāṇṭiya-vaḷa
-nāṭṭu nilai-p-puṟam cōḻa-pāṇṭiya-nilai-p paṟṟil muṉaiyatarai
yar kāṇi-y-āṉa kaṇṇa-maṅkalam-āṉa tiru-veṇkāvuṭaiyā na
llūrum cūrai-k-kuṭi-p paṟṟil Amarta-maṅkalamāṉa mutali nāyaka nal
lūrum Ivai y-iraṇṭūrilum nāṉk' ellaikk' uṭ-paṭṭa puravil paḻan ⌈
tēva-tāṉaṅkaḷum nāṭṭu Iṟai-y-ili-y-āṉa paṇi-makkaḷ viruttikaḷum
mutali-nāyaka-nallūr vayalil cūrai-k-kuṭiyil Uṭaiyār
cuntara-cōḷīcuram-uṭaiya nāyiṉāṟku-k kaṭaimai-p paṟṟ-āṉa
nilaṅkaḷum tiru-veṇkāvuṭaiya nallū lil muḷḷi vāya
l mutaliyār Uyya-niṉṟ' āṭuvā kāṇi'y'ā
ṉa niṅkaḷum nīkki Uḷḷa puravukku naccayipp'āṉa Ac
cum Ittāl varum kaṭaimai kuṭimai poṉ-vari Anta
rāyam cantu-vikkiṟamam vācal viṉivyōkam Eḻuttukku E
ṇṇai pantam taṟi-Iṟai taṭṭoli-taṭṭār-p-pāṭ
ṭam māṉ-vari Iṉa-vari Ēri-vari cekk-iṟai maṟṟum
Eppēṟpaṭṭa pala vari Upātikaḷum 6 tai-m mātam
mutal nam variyilār kaṇakkilum kaḻittu nāṭṭi
l niccayippilum kaḻikka coṉṉōm

Iṉ-ṉāḷ mutal
Uṭaiyān kuṉṟ' āṇṭa nāyaṉāṟku tāḻvu ceyyātāṉ
cantiyāṉa tiru-votta-cāma-c canti-k kuṭal-āka muṉ coṉ
ṉa puravukaḷ nīṅkal-āṉa varavum payir pāttu payir niṉṟa nila
ttukku cuntara-pāṇṭiyaṉ kōlāl Oru māvāl
kuḷa varicai nālilll oṉṟu kaḻittu nīkki niṉṟa nilattukku
Ūrāṭu kālāl Eṇ-kala-nellum kāl paḻa
ṅ kācum koḷvat' ākavum

Ik-kaṭaimaiyil
Āṭi-k kuṟuvai mūṉṟu loṉṟum varaku pātiyum
Eḷḷu-t tiṉai nālilll oṉṟum Aiṟpaci-k kuṟu⌈
vai pātiyum karumam y-iraṭṭiyum koḷvat' ākavu
m

tantōm Ip-paṭi cantirātitta-vaṟ cella
-k kallilum cempilum veṭṭi-k koḷ
ka

Ivai tuñcalūr uṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai cuntara-pāṇṭiya-pallava-rā
Eḻuttu yāṇṭu 6 nāḷ
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
